title: MATLAB on Windows throws "Service call timed out" error

content.raw:
Hello,

We have set up handsim on a Ubuntu 14.04 computer and configured the network parameters. 

On a Windows 7 computer, we installed Visual Studio 2013 and MATLAB 2016b then downloaded the latest release of Client SDK from this [link ](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=haptix_install&cat=haptix). 

However, when we try to run hx_matlab_controller.m, it gives us the following error:

```
hx_robot_info() Service call timed out.
Error using hxgz
Failed to get robot info

Error in hx_connect (line 26)
  hxgz('connect');
```

We also tried running Octave from the same computer and also from another Ubuntu 14.04 by setting network parameters and in both cases we were able to run and successfully move the hand.
content.html:
Hello,

We have set up handsim on a Ubuntu 14.04 computer and configured the network parameters.

On a Windows 7 computer, we installed Visual Studio 2013 and MATLAB 2016b then downloaded the latest release of Client SDK from this link .

However, when we try to run hx_matlab_controller.m, it gives us the following error:

hx_robot_info() Service call timed out.
Error using hxgz
Failed to get robot info

Error in hx_connect (line 26)
  hxgz('connect');

We also tried running Octave from the same computer and also from another Ubuntu 14.04 by setting network parameters and in both cases we were able to run and successfully move the hand.
